thread.section_title: GOCARE.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GOCARE.COM | www.gocare.com
thread.title: Ryan Mills

author: Ryan Mills
title: Ryan Mills
text: I filed a claim and expected contact within the 4 - 6 hour SLA that's promoted on the site. I called two days later to be told 'all our claims and purchases are backed up. We don't know when our system will be back up, call us again Monday.' Given the issue is on GoCare's side I'd expect proactive and regular communication to those affected. Poor customer experience, especially given it's for my son's school computer and they'll give him a loaner only through the end of this month.
